title: Microsoft or Observe.ai
content:
Education: Btech Tier 1
Years of Experience: 5+
Prior Experience: SDE 3 in a fintech startup
Current Compensation: 35L (34L Fixed + 1L variable)

Company: Observe.ai
Location: India
Title/Level:  SDE-2
Base Salary: 45L
Stocks - 3500 units vested over 4 years
No other components

Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L62
Location: India
Base Salary: 40L
Relocation: 5L
Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: $70K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Performance Bonus + Stock): 62.7L
Benefits: standard MS benefits


Which would be a better choice considering Learning, Future Growth and Work-Life balance?
Would love to know your views on the offers.

Interview questions: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-question/5988484/Microsoft-oror-SDE-2
